info.question: Which of the following can be attached to EC2 instances to store data?
Which of the following networking components can be used to host EC2 resources in the AWS cloud?

Your company is planning to host resources in the AWS cloud. They want to use services which can be used to decouple resources hosted on the cloud. Which of the following services can help fulfill this requirement?
Which of the following components of the CloudFront service can be used to distribute contents to users across the globe?

Your company is planning to move to the AWS cloud. You need to give a presentation on the cost perspective when moving existing resources to the AWS cloud. When it comes to Amazon EC2, which of the following is an advantage when it comes to the cost perspective?
answers: Having the ability of automated backups of the EC2 instance, so that you don't need to worry about the maintenance costs
The ability to choose low cost AMIs to prepare the EC2 instances
The ability to only pay for what you use
Ability to tag instances to reduce the overall cost
correctAnswer: The ability to only pay for what you use

info.question: Your company is planning to move to the AWS cloud. Once the movement to the cloud is complete, they want to ensure that the right security settings are put in place. Which of the below tools can assists from a security compliance?
There is a requirement to collect important metrics from AWS RDS and EC2 instances. Which of the following services can help fulfill this requirement?
Which of the following services can provide audit trail of all AWS services used within an account?
Which of the following services is most useful when a Disaster Recovery method is triggered in AWS?
Which of the following can be used to work with AWS services in a programmatic manner?
When designing a system, you use the principles of 'design for fasilure and nothing will fail.' Which of the following services/features of AWS can assist in supporting this design principle?

Currently your organization has an operational team that takes care of ID management in their on-premise data center. They now also need to manage users and groups created in AWS. Which of the following AWS tools would they need to use for performing this management function?

You have a devops team in your current organization structure. They are keen to know if there is any service available in AWS which can be used to manage infrastructure as code. Which of the following can be met with such a requirement?
Which of the following services is a fully managed, petabyte-scale data warehouse service in the AWS cloud?
Which of the following is the responsibility of AWS according to the Shared Responsibility Model?
answers: Managing AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)

info.question: Your company has just started using the resources on the AWS cloud. They want to get an idea of the costs being incurred so far for the resources being used. How can this be achieved?
answers: By going to the Amazon EC2 dashboard. Here you can see the costs of running EC2 resources
By using the AWS Cost and Usage reports Explorer. Here you can see the running and forecast costs
By using the AWS Trusted Advisor dashboard. This dashboard will give you all the costs
By seeing the AWS Cloud Trail logs
correctAnswer: By using the AWS Cost and Usage reports Explorer. Here you can see the running and forecast costs

info.question: By default who from the below roles has complete administartive control over all resources in the respective AWS account?

Your design team is planning to design an application that will be hosted on the AWS cloud. One of their main non-functional requirements is 'Reduce inter-dependencies so failures do not impact other components.' Which of the following concepts does this requirement relate to?
Which of the following can be used to increase the fault tolerance of an application?
answers: Deploying resources across multiple edge locations
Deploying resources across multiple Availability Zones
Deploying resources across multipls AWS accounts
correctAnswer: Deploying resources across multiple Availability Zones

info.question: Which of the following security requirements are managed by AWS?
Which of the following terms relate to 'Creating systems that scale to the required capacity basec on changes in demand?

Your company is planning to offload some of the batch processing workloads on AWS. These jobs can be interrupted and resumed at any time. Which of the following instance types would be the most cost effective to use for this purpose?
Which of the following needs a user name and password to access AWS resources?

Your company is planning to use AWS cloud. But there is a management decision that resources need to split department wise. And the decision is tending towards managing multiple AWS accounts. Which of the following would help in effective management and also provide efficient costing model?
Which of the following can be used as an additional layer of security to using a user name and password when logging into the AWS Console?
Which AWS cloud service helps in quick deployment of resources which can make use of different programming languages such as .Net and Java?

Your company handles a crucial ecommerce application. This application needs to have an uptime at least 99.5%. There is a decision to move the application to the AWS cloud. Which of the following deployment strategies can help build a robust achitecture for such an application?
answers: Deploying the application across multiple VPCs
Deploying the application across multiple Regions
Deploying the application across multiple edge locations
Deploying the application across multiple subnets
correctAnswer: Deploying the application across multiple Regions

info.question: Which of the following initiatives from AWS helps organizations reduce the overall expenditure for IT companies when they host resources on the AWS cloud?
answers: They continually reduce the cost of cloud computing
They use better security mechanisms so you don't need to think about security at all
They allow deployment of multiple resources
correctAnswer: They continually reduce the cost of cloud computing

info.question: You are planning on deploying a video based application onto the AWS cloud. These videos will be accessed by users across the world. Whcih of the below services can help stream the content in an efficient manner to the users across the globe?
Which of the following is a fully managed NoSQL database service available with AWS?
Which of the following storage options is best when you want to store archive data?

If there is a requirement to host EC2 instances in the AWS cloud wherein the utilization is guaranteed to be consistent for a long period of time, which of the following would you utilize to ensure costs are minimized?
Which of the following services helps provide a dedicated connection from on-premise infrastructure to resources hosted in the AWS cloud?
Which of the following is NOT a category recommendation given by the Trusted Advisor?

A company is deploying a two-tier, highly available web application to AWS. The application needs a storage layer to store artifacts such as photos and videos. Which of the following services can be used as the underlying storage mechanism?
When giving permission to users via the AWS Indentity and Access Management tool, which of the following principles should be applied when granting permissions?
Which of the following mentioned services is equivalent to hosting virtual servers on an on-premise location?

You have a set of EC2 instances hosted on the AWS cloud. The EC2 instances are hosting a web application. If you get a DDoS attack from the internet which of the following can help in reducing the overall threat to your EC2 instances?
answers: Usage of Network Access Control Lists
correctAnswer: Usage of Network Access Control Lists

info.question: Your company currently uses VM Templates to spin up virtual machines on their on-premise infrastructure. Which of the following can be used in a similar way to spin up EC2 instances on the AWS cloud?
Which of the below cannot be used to get data onto Amazon Glacier?

Your company is planning to pay for an AWS Support plan. They have the following requirements as far as the support plan goes: '24x7 access to Cloud Support Engineers via email, chat, and phone' and 'A response time of less than 1 hour for any critical faults.' Which of the following plans will suffice keeping in mind the cost factor?
Which of the following are features of an edge location?
answers: Used in conjunction with the CloudFront service
correctAnswer: Used in conjunction with the CloudFront service

info.question: Which of the following storage options provides the option of Lifecycle policies that can be used to move objects to archive storage?
Which of the following features of Amazon RDS allows for better availability of databases?
There is a requirement for hosting a set of servers in the cloud for a short period of 3 months. Which of the following types of instances should be chosen to be cost effective?
Which of the following from AWS can be used to transfer petabytes of data from on-premise locations to the AWS cloud?
When working with the AWS cloud which of the following are headaches you don't need to worry about?
answers: Having complete control over the physical infrastructure, so you don't need to worry about wat AWS is doing
Having the pay as you go model, so you don't need to worry if you are burning costs for non-running resources
Having no need to worry about security
correctAnswer: Having the pay as you go model, so you don't need to worry if you are burning costs for non-running resources

info.question: Your company wants to move an existing Oracle database to the AWS cloud. Which of the following services can help facilitate this move?
Which of the following features of AWS RDS allows for offloading reads of the database?
Which of the following terms refers to another geographic location in AWS?
A company wants to have a database hosted on AWS. As much as possible they want to have control over the database itself. Which of the following would be an ideal option for this?
answers: Hosting the database on an EC2 instance
correctAnswer: Hosting the database on an EC2 instance

info.question: A company currently has an application which consists of a .Net layer which connects to a MySQL database. They now want to move this application onto AWS. They want to make use of all AWS features such as high availability and automated backups. Which of the following would be an ideal database in AWS to migrate to for this requirement?
answers: An EC2 instance with MySQL installed
An EC2 instance with Aurora installed

info.question: Which of the following statements are FALSE when it comes to elasticity?
answers: Diverting traffic to instances based on the demand
Diverting traffic to instances with the least load
Diverting traffic to instances with higher capacity
correctAnswer: Diverting traffic to instances with higher capacity

info.question: Which of the following services relates the concept of 'Distributing traffic to multiple EC2 instances'?
Which of the following services relates the concept of 'Scaling up resources based on demand'?
A company is planning to migrate their existing AWS services to the cloud. Which of the following would help them do a cost benefit analysis of moving to the AWS cloud?
Which of the following does AWS perform on its behalf for EBS volumes to make it less prone to failure?
answers: Replication of the volume across Availability Zones
Replication of the volume in the same Availability Zone
Replication of the volume across Regions
Replication of the volume Edge locations
correctAnswer: Replication of the volume in the same Availability Zone

Which of the following can be used to view one bill when you have multiple AWS accounts?

Your company is planning to host a large ecommerce application on the AWS cloud. One of their major concerns is internet attacks such as DDoS attacks. Which of the following services can help mitigate this concern?
